trans-unit.source: Represents a special field that displays command buttons to perform selecting, editing, inserting, or deleting operations in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et bestemt felt som viser kommandoknappene for å utføre ved å velge, redigere, innsetting eller sletting av operasjoner i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The CommandField class is a special field used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display command buttons that perform delete, edit, insert, or select operations.
trans-unit.target: CommandField-klasse er et bestemt felt som brukes av databundet kontroller (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) for å vise kommandoknapper som utfører delete, redigere, sette inn eller velg operasjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The command buttons to perform these operations can be shown or hidden using the properties shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen-knappen til å utføre disse operasjonene kan være vises eller skjules ved hjelp av egenskapene vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowDeleteButton%2A>|Shows or hides a Delete button in a CommandField field for each record in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowDeleteButton%2A>| Viser eller skjuler en Slett-knapp i et CommandField felt for hver oppføring i kontrollen databindingselementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowDeleteButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Delete button allows the user to delete a record from the data source.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowEditButton%2A>|Shows or hides an Edit button in a CommandField field for each record in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Slett lar brukeren slette en oppføring fra datakilden. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowEditButton%2A>| Viser eller skjuler et redigeringsknappen i et CommandField felt for hver oppføring i kontrollen databindingselementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowEditButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Edit button allows the user to edit a record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Rediger tillater brukeren å redigere en oppføring fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the Edit button for a specific record, that Edit button is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren klikker Rediger-knappen for en bestemt post redigere erstattes knappen med en Oppdater-knappen og Avbryt-knappen.

trans-unit.source: All other command buttons are also hidden.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowInsertButton%2A>|Shows or hides the New button in a CommandField field.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre kommandoen skjules også. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowInsertButton%2A>| Viser eller skjuler ny-knappen i et CommandField-felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowInsertButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The New button allows the user to insert a new record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ny tillater brukeren å sette inn en ny post i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the New button, it is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren klikker Ny, er det erstattet med en Insert-knappen og Avbryt-knappen.

trans-unit.source: All other command buttons are also hidden.
trans-unit.target: Alle skjules andre kommandoen også.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support inserting operations, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowSelectButton%2A>|Shows or hides a Select button in a CommandField field for each record in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: **Obs!** denne egenskapen gjelder bare for databundet kontroller som støtter innsetting operasjoner, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowSelectButton%2A>| Viser eller skjuler en Select-knapp i et CommandField felt for hver oppføring i kontrollen databindingselementer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowSelectButton%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The Select button allows the user to select a record in the data-bound control.| In addition, the Cancel button displayed when a record is in edit or insert mode can be shown or hidden by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowCancelButton%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Velg-knappen tillater at brukeren velger en oppføring i kontrollen databindingselementer. | I tillegg Avbryt vises når en oppføring er Rediger eller Sett inn-modus kan vises eller skjules ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowCancelButton%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.ShowCancelButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete, update, and insert functionality.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når en databundet kontroll brukes sammen med en datakildekontroll (som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen), databundet kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gi automatisk sletting, oppdatere og innsetting funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: For other data sources, you need to provide the routines to perform these operations during the appropriate events for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Du må oppgi for å utføre disse oppgavene i løpet av de aktuelle hendelsene for kontrollen som er bundet til data for andre datakilder.

trans-unit.source: The CommandField field is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: Feltet CommandField vises forskjellig avhengig databundet kontrollen den brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a CommandField field as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen viser et CommandField felt som en kolonne, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser som en rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To specify the type of button to display, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi hvilken type for å vise, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, you can specify the text to display for the buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>er satt til `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link`, kan du angi teksten som skal vises for knappene ved å angi egenskapene som vises i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A>|The caption for the Cancel button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteText%2A>|The caption for the Delete button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditText%2A>|The caption for the Edit button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertText%2A>|The caption for the Insert button.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A>| Teksten for Avbryt-knappen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteText%2A>| Teksten for Slett. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditText%2A>| Teksten for Rediger. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertText%2A>| Teksten for Insert-knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A>|The caption for the New button.
trans-unit.target: **Obs!** denne egenskapen gjelder bare for databundet kontroller som støtter insert-operasjoner, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A>| Teksten for ny.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectText%2A>|The caption for the Select button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateText%2A>|The caption for the Update button.| Instead of displaying a command button or a link button, you can display an image button by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the properties shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: **Obs!** denne egenskapen gjelder bare for databundet kontroller som støtter insert-operasjoner, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectText%2A>| Teksten for knappen Velg. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateText%2A>| Teksten for Oppdater-knappen. | I stedet for å vise en kommando eller en kobling, kan du vise et bildeknappen ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Image` og deretter angi egenskapene som vises i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelImageUrl%2A>|The image to display for the Cancel button| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteImageUrl%2A>|The image to display for the Delete button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditImageUrl%2A>|The image to display for the Edit button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertText%2A>|The image to display for the Insert button.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelImageUrl%2A>| Bildet som skal vises for Avbryt-knappen | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteImageUrl%2A>| Bildet som skal vises for Slett. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditImageUrl%2A>| Bildet som skal vises for Rediger. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertText%2A>| Bildet som skal vises for Insert-knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewImageUrl%2A>|The image to display for the New button.
trans-unit.target: **Obs!** denne egenskapen gjelder bare for databundet kontroller som støtter insert-operasjoner, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewImageUrl%2A>| Bildet som skal vises for ny.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectImageUrl%2A>|The image to display for the Select button.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateImageUrl%2A>|The image to display for the Update button.| By default, when the user clicks a button in a CommandField field, validation is performed on all validation controls on the page.
trans-unit.target: **Obs!** denne egenskapen gjelder bare for databundet kontroller som støtter insert-operasjoner, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>-kontroll. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectImageUrl%2A>| Bildet som skal vises for knappen Velg. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateImageUrl%2A>| Bildet som skal vises for Oppdater-knappen. | Som standard når brukeren klikker en knapp i et CommandField felt valideringen utføres på alle validering vises på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from occurring when a button is clicked, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CausesValidation%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: For å forhindre validering oppstår når brukeren klikker en knapp, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can hide a CommandField field in a data-bound control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skjule CommandField felt i en databundet-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CommandField field allows you to customize its header and footer sections.
trans-unit.target: Feltet CommandField kan du tilpasse inndelingene topp- og bunntekst.

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or the footer section, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> property, respectively.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en tekst i toppteksten eller bunnteksten, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>egenskapen henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise et bilde i stedet for å vise tekst i toppteksten, ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the header section in a CommandField object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil skjule delen topptekst i et CommandField-objekt, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen) kan vise eller skjule bare delen hele topp kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual button field.
trans-unit.target: Disse databundet kontroller støtter ikke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen for et enkelt knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property.
trans-unit.target: Vis eller Skjul delen hele overskrift for en databundet kontroll (hvis tilgjengelig), bruker kontrollens `ShowHeader` egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the CommandField object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tilpasse utseendet til CommandField-objektet (skriftfarge bakgrunnsfarge og så videre) ved å angi stilegenskaper for de ulike delene av feltet.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene annen stil.

trans-unit.source: |Style property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|The style settings for the child Web server controls of the CommandField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|The style settings for the footer section of the CommandField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|The style settings for the header section of the CommandField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data items in the CommandField object.|
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for de underordnede server webkontroller for CommandField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for bunnteksten for CommandField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for delen topptekst for CommandField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for dataelementer i CommandField-objektet. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes vanligvis når du legger til felt til en dynamisk opprettet databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: Dynamisk legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>feltet til en databundet kontroll, oppretter du en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>objekt, angi egenskapene og deretter legge den til databindingselementer kontrollens feltet samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>styre, legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om dynamisk kan du legge til felt i en databundet, det anbefales at feltene statisk deklarert og deretter vises eller skjules, etter behov.

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Statisk deklarerer alle felt reduserer størrelsen på visningsstatusen for den overordnede databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the Cancel button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for Avbryt-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the CancelImageUrl property to specify the image to display for the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, bruke egenskapen CancelImageUrl til å angi bildet som skal vises for Avbryt-knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP osv), så lenge klientens nettleser støtter dette formatet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As an alternative to displaying an image for the Cancel button, you can display text by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som et alternativ til å vise et bilde for Avbryt-knappen, kan du vise tekst ved første innstillingen det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image to display for the Cancel button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for Avbryt-knappen på en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption for the Cancel button displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for Avbryt-knappen som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the CancelText property to specify the text to display for the Cancel button.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, by default all validation controls on the page are validated.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, som standard alle validering vises på siden, godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: To limit validation to only a certain group of validation controls, create a validation group and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A> property to the validation group's name.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en valideringsgruppe for å begrense valideringen bare en bestemt gruppe validering Kontroller, og angi deretter det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen validering gruppenavnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method is implemented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-derived types to add text and controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object of a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeCell implementeres av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>-avledede typer for å legge til tekst og kontroller til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekt til en kontroll med data som bruker tabeller til å vise brukergrensesnittet (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: These data controls create the complete table structure row-by-row when the control's `CreateChildControls` method is called.
trans-unit.target: Disse Kontroller opprette hele tabellen strukturen rad-av-raden når kontrollens `CreateChildControls` -metoden.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeCell kalles av den `InitializeRow` -metoden til kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.
trans-unit.target: Kall denne metoden når du skriver et egendefinert databundet kontrollere som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekter initialisere cellene i tabellstrukturen med data eller kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As an alternative to displaying text for the Insert button, you can display an image by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som et alternativ til å vise tekst for Insert-knappen, kan du vise et bilde av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Image` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.InsertImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for ny-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP osv), så lenge klientens nettleser støtter dette formatet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As an alternative to displaying an image for the New button, you can display text by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som et alternativ til å vise et bilde for den nye knappen, kan du vise tekst ved første innstillingen det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for ny-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Cancel button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en Avbryt-knappen vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowCancelButton property to specify whether the Cancel button is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowCancelButton-egenskapen til å angi om Avbryt-knappen vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: A Cancel button can be displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field when the corresponding record in a data-bound control is in edit or insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Avbryt-knappen kan vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>feltet når den tilsvarende oppføringen i en databundet kontroll er i Rediger eller Sett inn-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: The Cancel button allows the user to cancel the edit or insert operation and returns the record to its normal display mode.
trans-unit.target: Avbryt-knappen tillater brukeren å avbryte redigeringen eller sette inn operasjonen, og returnerer oppføringen til den normal visningsmodusen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A> property to specify the text to display for a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>er satt til `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link`, bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A>til å angi teksten som skal vises for Avbryt-knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du vise et bilde av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Image` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.CancelImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis en Avbryt-knappen på en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Delete button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en Slett-knapp vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowDeleteButton property to specify whether a Delete button is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field for each record in the data-source control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ShowDeleteButton som angir om en Slett-knapp skal vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>feltet for hver oppføring i datakilden-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: The Delete button allows you to remove a record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Slett kan du fjerne en oppføring fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic delete functionality.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når en databundet kontroll brukes sammen med en datakildekontroll (som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen), databundet kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk delete funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the delete operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi for å utføre sletteoperasjonen under riktig-hendelsen for kontrollen som er bundet til data for andre datakilder.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteText%2A> property to specify the text to display for a Delete button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>er satt til `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link`, bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteText%2A>til å angi teksten som skal vises for en Slett-knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du vise et bilde av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Image` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.DeleteImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display a Delete button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis en Slett-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an Edit button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en redigeringsknappen skal vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowEditButton property to specify whether an Edit button is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field for each record in the data-source control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ShowEditButton-egenskapen til å angi om en redigeringsknappen skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>feltet for hver oppføring i datakilden-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: The Edit button allows you to edit the values of a record.
trans-unit.target: Rediger lar deg redigere verdiene i en oppføring.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks an Edit button, input controls are displayed for each field in the record.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren klikker en Rediger-knappen, vises inndata kontroller for hvert felt i oppføringen.

trans-unit.source: The Edit button for the record is replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons for the record are hidden.
trans-unit.target: Rediger-knappen for oppføringen er erstattet med en Oppdater-knappen og Avbryt-knappen, og alle andre kommandoen knapper for oppføringen er skjult.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Update button updates the record with the new values in the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker oppdateringsknappen oppdaterer oppføringen med de nye verdiene i datakilden, mens handlingen å klikke Avbryt avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når en databundet kontroll brukes sammen med en datakildekontroll (som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen), databundet kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk oppdatering funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the update operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi for å utføre oppdateringen under riktig-hendelsen for kontrollen som er bundet til data for andre datakilder.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditText%2A> property to specify the text to display for an Edit button.

trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du vise et bilde av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Image` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.EditImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a New button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en ny knapp vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowInsertButton property to specify whether a New button is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ShowInsertButton som angir om en ny knapp skal vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>felt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: The New button is displayed only once in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field and allows the user to add a new record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den nye knappen vises bare én gang i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>feltet og tillater brukeren å legge til en ny post i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data-bound controls that support insert operations, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen gjelder bare for databindingselementer Kontroller at støtte setter inn operasjoner, som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the New button, input controls are displayed for each field displayed in the data-bound control, allowing the user to enter the values for the new record.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren klikker Ny, vises inndata kontroller for hvert felt som vises i databindingselementer-kontrollen tillater brukeren å angi verdiene for den nye posten.

trans-unit.source: The New button is replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button, and all other command buttons in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field are hidden.
trans-unit.target: Ny erstattes med en Insert-knappen og Avbryt-knappen, og alle andre kommandoen knappene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>feltet er skjult.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Insert button adds the record to the data source, whereas clicking the Cancel button cancels the operation.
trans-unit.target: Å klikke Sett inn legger til oppføringen i datakilden, mens Hvis du klikker Avbryt-knappen avbryter operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a data-bound control is used in combination with a data source control (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control), the data-bound control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic insert functionality.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når en databundet kontroll brukes sammen med en datakildekontroll (som en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen), databundet kontrollen kan dra nytte av datakilden kontrollens funksjoner og gir automatisk insert-funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: For other data sources, you must provide the routines to perform the insert operation during the appropriate event for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi for å utføre innsettingsoperasjonen under riktig hendelsen for kontrollen som er bundet til data for andre datakilder.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A> property to specify the text to display for a New button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>er satt til `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link`, bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A>til å angi teksten som skal vises for en ny knapp.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du vise et bilde av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Image` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.NewImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display a New button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis en ny knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Select button is displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en Select-knappen vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowSelectButton property to specify whether a Select button is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field for each record in the data-source control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen ShowSelectButton som angir om en Select-knappen skal vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>feltet for hver oppføring i datakilden-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: The Select button allows the user to select a row in the data-source control.
trans-unit.target: Velg-knappen tillater at brukeren velger en rad i datakilden kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the Select button for a record is clicked, the data-source control responds accordingly.
trans-unit.target: Når du velger-knappen for en oppføring, svarer datakilden kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> properties to values corresponding to the selected row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>styre oppdateringer i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>egenskapene til verdier som svarer til den valgte raden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> style is then applied to the selected row and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>deretter stilen til den valgte raden og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>hendelser registreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectText%2A> property to specify the text to display for a Select button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>er satt til `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link`, bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectText%2A>til å angi teksten som skal vises for en Select-knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can display an image by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du vise et bilde av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Image` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.SelectImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display a Select button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Vis en Select-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for an Update button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bilde som skal vises for en Oppdater-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Image`, use the UpdateImageUrl property to specify the image to display for an Update button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>er satt til `ButtonType.Image`, bruke egenskapen UpdateImageUrl til å angi bildet som skal vises for en Oppdater-knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: Dette bildet kan være i alle filformater (JPG, GIF, BMP osv), så lenge klientens nettleser støtter dette formatet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As an alternative to displaying an image for an Update button, you can display text by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som et alternativ til å vise et bilde for en Oppdater-knappen, kan du vise tekst ved første innstillingen det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL for an image to display for an Update button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen for et bilde som skal vises for en Oppdater-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption for an Update button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for en Oppdater-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> felt.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> field is set to `ButtonType.Button` or `ButtonType.Link`, use the UpdateText property to specify the text to display in an Update button.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>er satt til `ButtonType.Button` eller `ButtonType.Link`, bruker du UpdateText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i en Oppdater-knappen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As an alternative to displaying text for an Update button, you can display an image by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A> property to `ButtonType.Image` and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som et alternativ til å vise tekst for en Oppdater-knappen, kan du vise et bilde av første den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen `ButtonType.Image` og deretter angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField.UpdateImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonFieldBase.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption for an Update button in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for en Oppdater-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Update".
trans-unit.target: Standard er "Oppdatering".

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om kontrollene finnes i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateSupportsCallback method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateSupportsCallback er en helper brukes til å bestemme om kontrollene finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> class does not support callbacks when the Select button is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>klassen støtter ikke tilbakeringinger når Velg-knappen vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented to throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception when the Select button is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert for å slette en <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak under Velg-knappen vises.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The Select button is displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Velg-knappen vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"></xref> class does support callbacks when the Select button is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField"> </xref> klassen støtter tilbakeringinger når Velg-knappen vises.
